description: Make the most of in-season nectarines with this sweet breakfast smoothie recipe. Also featuring orange, pear and carrot, enjoy in a smoothie bowl or on the go.

name: Nectarine & Orange Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place nectarine, orange, carrot, pear and coconut water in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blitz until smooth.
